name: suksma - 411-laepsy
milkdrop_raw:
MILKDROP_PRESET_VERSION=201
PSVERSION=2

PSVERSION_COMP=2
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=2.400
fDecay=0.880
fVideoEchoZoom=1.000
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.500
nVideoEchoOrientation=3
nWaveMode=2
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0

bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0

bDarkenCenter=0

bDarken=0

bInvert=0

fWaveScale=1.605
fWaveSmoothing=0.500
fWaveParam=0.000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000
fWarpScale=2.853
fZoomExponent=1.00000
fShader=1.000
zoom=1.00034
rot=0.00000
cx=0.500
cy=0.500
dx=0.00000
dy=0.00000
warp=0.00000
sx=1.00000
sy=1.00000
wave_r=0.500
wave_g=0.500

wave_y=0.500
ob_size=0.005

ob_g=0.000

ob_a=1.000
ib_size=0.005
ib_r=0.000
ib_g=0.000
ib_b=0.000
ib_a=0.000
nMotionVectorsX=3.200
nMotionVectorsY=3.000
mv_dx=0.000
mv_dy=0.000

mv_r=1.000
mv_g=1.000
mv_b=1.000
mv_a=0.000
b1n=0.000
b2n=0.000
b3n=0.000
b1x=1.000
b2x=1.000
b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250
wavecode_0_enabled=0
wavecode_0_samples=512
wavecode_0_sep=0
wavecode_0_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_0_bUseDots=0
wavecode_0_bDrawThick=0

wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wavecode_1_enabled=0
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_1_bUseDots=0
wavecode_1_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_1_bAdditive=0
wavecode_1_scaling=1.00000
wavecode_1_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_1_r=1.000
wavecode_1_g=1.000
wavecode_1_b=1.000
wavecode_1_a=1.000
wavecode_2_enabled=0
wavecode_2_samples=512
wavecode_2_sep=0
wavecode_2_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_2_bUseDots=0
wavecode_2_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_2_bAdditive=0
wavecode_2_scaling=1.00000
wavecode_2_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_2_r=1.000
wavecode_2_g=1.000
wavecode_2_b=1.000
wavecode_2_a=1.000
wavecode_3_enabled=0
wavecode_3_samples=512
wavecode_3_sep=0
wavecode_3_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_3_bUseDots=0
wavecode_3_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_3_bAdditive=0
wavecode_3_scaling=1.00000
wavecode_3_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_3_r=1.000
wavecode_3_g=1.000
wavecode_3_b=1.000
wavecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_0_enabled=1
shapecode_0_sides=6
shapecode_0_additive=0
shapecode_0_thickOutline=1
shapecode_0_textured=0
shapecode_0_num_inst=1
shapecode_0_x=0.200
shapecode_0_y=0.100
shapecode_0_rad=0.19988
shapecode_0_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_0_r=1.000
shapecode_0_g=1.000
shapecode_0_b=1.000
shapecode_0_a=1.000
shapecode_0_r2=1.000
shapecode_0_g2=0.000
shapecode_0_b2=0.000
shapecode_0_a2=0.000
shapecode_0_border_r=1.000
shapecode_0_border_g=1.000
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.000
shape_0_per_frame1=y = y + 0.1*bass_att;
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=6
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=1
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=1
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.100
shapecode_1_rad=0.20028
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=1.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000
shapecode_1_r2=0.000
shapecode_1_g2=1.000
shapecode_1_b2=1.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=0.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=y = y + 0.1*mid_att;
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=6
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=1
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.800
shapecode_2_y=0.100
shapecode_2_rad=0.20048
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=1.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=0.000
shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=y = y + 0.1*treb_att;
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=12
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.500
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=1.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=rad = rad + 0.1*sin(2*bass_att);
shape_3_per_frame2=x = x + 0.4*cos(5*time);
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.502*(0.61*sin(0.933*time) + 0.401*sin(1.045*time));
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.504*(0.605*sin(0.909*time) + 0.41*sin(0.956*time));
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.501*(0.60*sin(0.910*time) + 0.40*sin(0.992*time));
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=q1 = wave_r;
per_frame_6=q2 = wave_g;
per_frame_7=q3 = wave_b;
per_frame_8=q4 = abs(1-wave_r);
per_frame_9=q5 = abs(1-wave_g);
per_frame_10=q6 = abs(1-wave_b);
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=rot = rot + 0.05+ abs(min(8*dx_r,8*dy_r));
per_pixel_6=zoom = zoom + abs(22*dx_r)*(3*rad);
per_pixel_7=dx = dx + dx_r;
per_pixel_8=dy = dy+ dy_r;
per_pixel_9=
per_pixel_10=zoom = zoom - 0.04*sin(3*dx_r-3*cos(6*ang)*0.5-rad);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float2 noise_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_4=`    float4 noiseVal = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, noise_uv);
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 adj = texsize.zw;
warp_7=`//float2 adj = 0;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 uvn = uv + .005*noiseVal + float2(-1.1,-1.5)*adj;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`// sample previous frame
warp_12=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_13=`// darken (decay) over time
warp_14=`    ret.x = (ret.x-1.4*q6)*(1-q6*2.5); //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`
warp_17=`float burn = saturate(GetBlur1(uvn).x + (0.5-noiseVal)*.15);
warp_18=`float fuel = pow(ret.z*1 + GetBlur1(uv).z*.0,1);
warp_19=`
warp_20=`ret.y = 0;
warp_21=`
warp_22=`if (burn > 0.1)
warp_23=`{
warp_24=`ret.x = fuel*q6*60;
warp_25=`ret.z -= ret.z*q6*120;
warp_26=`}
warp_27=`
warp_28=`else {ret.z += 1.3*q6;
warp_29=`//ret.x = 0;
warp_30=`}
warp_31=`
warp_32=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).x,
comp_4=`
comp_5=`ret = lerp (
comp_6=`GetBlur1(uv).x + GetBlur3(uv).x,
comp_7=`ret,
comp_8=`pow(ret,1));
comp_9=`  
comp_10=`//  ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).x - GetBlur1(uv).x;
comp_11=`    ret = pow(ret,float3(5,1,.5));
comp_12=`    ret *= 1.0; //gamma
comp_13=` 
comp_14=`}
